name: Gloves of Sorcery
data: It decreases the users strength pathetically.
It decreases the users wisdom unnoticably.
It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It has adequate armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'spacial manipulation'.
